JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Love Carpe Diem, Zagreb, Croatia, is a company which provides services in tourism.we cooperate with the best hotel resorts and camping villages in Croatia, EU and SE Asia. Our passion for tourism and individual approach to each destination has established us as a reliable, and smiles on guests faces every season confirm our quality. we are looking for charismatic people who want to start or develop their carrer in tourism!

Experience unique combination of fun, work and learning new skills - all in a job of tourist entertainer!
You don`t need formal education or experience - your motivation and passion for this job are a great start!

If you want to work with kids, organise sport tournaments, run various workshops or perform - this is the place to apply and join us for season or start a new career! We provide education and great working conditions!

Job description:

The tourist animator performs fun, recreational, sports, cultural and other leisure programmes for tourists (guests of hotel houses, camps and other tourist facilities).

Job can be performed in different segments as:
  • SPORTS through the organisation and delivering morning gymnastics, aerobics, organising various sports tournaments (swimming, basketball, football, table tenis, beach volley, tennis...), bicycle tours and etc...
  • DAILY ENTERTAINMENT through organising for example water olimpics, treasure hunts, games without limits and various different games
  • CHILDREN`S through management of children`s program activities and organization of larger groups of children in various creative-educational contents
  • EVENING PROGRAMS through organization of various dance games for adults, delivering themed parties etc.


Job requirements:
  • Systematicity
  • Developed communication skills
  • Ability to build good relations with guests
  • Creativity and helpfulness
  • Hospitality and calmness
  • Stress resistance
  • Proficiency in one European language
  • Language fluency in English (expected level: B2 or more)


Employer offers:
  • Work in smaller or larger teams at one of over 70 locations in Croatia or abroad
  • Monthly income depending on the previous experience and knowledge (1000 - 1150 EUR net a month)
  • Overtime, work on sunday and holidays payed additionaly
  • Accomodation and paid meals (3 meals a day) inside work premises
  • Travel costs of arriving to the destination are not covered but in case of internal change/transfer of location employer covers all costs
  • Prior education (online and onsite), supervision and support during work
  • Seasonal work from 2,5 -7 months depending on the candidates availability; possibility of winter employment as a posted worker in the EU or in tropical destinations
  • Possibility of advancement and long-term employment
  • Work clothes provided


More information:

EURES Croatia, EURES-Rijeka@hzz.hr

How to apply?

Submit your application by e-mail: job@carpe-diem.hr or through the application form on: https://www.carpe-diem.hr/Employment



Read more on https://www.carpe-diem.hr/
